problem.markdown:
1. In general, a multiplexer has () One data input, several data outputs and selection input () One data input, one data output, and one selection input (x) several data inputs, one data outputs, and selection inputs () None of these
2) Which of the following codes exhibit even parity? () 11111111 () 01111000 (x) Both the above () 111110000
3) Data selectors are basically the same as (x) Multiplexers () Demultiplexers () Encoders () Decoders
4) The device used to convert a binary number to a 7-segment display format is () Encoder (x) Decoder () Register () Multiplexer

choicegroup.choice: One data input, several data outputs and selection input
One data input, one data output, and one selection input
several data inputs, one data outputs, and selection inputs
